title: [Sponsor] Literati
content:
We, the people of Literati, believe that great stories can shape the world. Mostly, we believe it shouldn’t be so hard to find a book worth reading. So we created a book club so good, you might actually join. Imagine a magical place where conversations on the internet are thoughtful and nuanced. Get your next read chosen by visionaries — then talk about it with them, in a book club unlike any other.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
